abstract: The chairman of the Senate Banking Committee proposed giving the Federal Reserve responsibility for protecting consumers from abusive and deceptive financial products.
snippet: The chairman of the Senate Banking Committee proposed giving the Federal Reserve responsibility for protecting consumers from abusive and deceptive financial products.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — In an effort to secure Republican support for an overhaul of financial regulations, the chairman of the Senate Banking Committee on Monday proposed giving the Federal Reserve responsibility for protecting consumers from abusive and deceptive financial products.

headline.main: Dodd Proposes Giving Fed the Task of Consumer Protection
headline.print_headline: Dodd Proposes Giving Fed the Task of Consumer Protection
